column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Making a deep dish pizza usually takes about 40 minutes
column3: as long as you order an appetizer though you're all set.  Our waiter stopped by our table a number of times to tell us how the progress on the pizza was going which was really nice.  When we did get it though
column5: (especially cause we were asked if we wanted butter on the crust!).  It was a simple pizza with peppers and onions
column7: I would recommend this place to anybody from or visiting Chicago!
